00146         const char* pMode = "rb") = 0;

00153         const std::string& pMode = std::string("rb"));

00233 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00234 AI_FORCE_INLINE
00235 IOSystem::IOSystem()
00236 : m_pathStack() {
00237     // empty
00238 }
00239 
00240 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00241 AI_FORCE_INLINE
00242 IOSystem::~IOSystem() {
00243     // empty
00244 }
00245 
00246 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00247 // For compatibility, the interface of some functions taking a std::string was
00248 // changed to const char* to avoid crashes between binary incompatible STL
00249 // versions. This code her is inlined,  so it shouldn't cause any problems.
00250 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00251 
00252 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00253 AI_FORCE_INLINE
00254 IOStream* IOSystem::Open(const std::string& pFile, const std::string& pMode) {
00255     // NOTE:
00256     // For compatibility, interface was changed to const char* to
00257     // avoid crashes between binary incompatible STL versions
00258     return Open(pFile.c_str(),pMode.c_str());
00259 }
00260 
00261 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00262 AI_FORCE_INLINE
00263 bool IOSystem::Exists( const std::string& pFile) const {
00264     // NOTE:
00265     // For compatibility, interface was changed to const char* to
00266     // avoid crashes between binary incompatible STL versions
00267     return Exists(pFile.c_str());
00268 }
00269 
00270 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00271 AI_FORCE_INLINE
00272 bool IOSystem::ComparePaths (const std::string& one, const std::string& second) const {
00273     // NOTE:
00274     // For compatibility, interface was changed to const char* to
00275     // avoid crashes between binary incompatible STL versions
00276     return ComparePaths(one.c_str(),second.c_str());
00277 }
00278 
00279 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00280 AI_FORCE_INLINE
00281 bool IOSystem::PushDirectory( const std::string &path ) {
00282     if ( path.empty() ) {
00283         return false;
00284     }
00285 
00286     m_pathStack.push_back( path );
00287 
00288     return true;
00289 }
00290 
00291 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00292 AI_FORCE_INLINE
00293 const std::string &IOSystem::CurrentDirectory() const {
00294     if ( m_pathStack.empty() ) {
00295         static const std::string Dummy("");
00296         return Dummy;
00297     }
00298     return m_pathStack[ m_pathStack.size()-1 ];
00299 }
00300 
00301 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00302 AI_FORCE_INLINE
00303 size_t IOSystem::StackSize() const {
00304     return m_pathStack.size();
00305 }
00306 
00307 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00308 AI_FORCE_INLINE
00309 bool IOSystem::PopDirectory() {
00310     if ( m_pathStack.empty() ) {
00311         return false;
00312     }
00313 
00314     m_pathStack.pop_back();
00315 
00316     return true;
00317 }
00318 
00319 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00320 AI_FORCE_INLINE
00321 bool IOSystem::CreateDirectory( const std::string &path ) {
00322     if ( path.empty() ) {
00323         return false;
00324     }
00325 
00326 #ifdef _WIN32
00327     return 0 != ::_mkdir( path.c_str() );
00328 #else
00329     return 0 != ::mkdir( path.c_str(), 0777 );
00330 #endif // _WIN32
00331 }
00332 
00333 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00334 AI_FORCE_INLINE
00335 bool IOSystem::ChangeDirectory( const std::string &path ) {
00336     if ( path.empty() ) {
00337         return false;
00338     }
00339 
00340 #ifdef _WIN32
00341     return 0 != ::_chdir( path.c_str() );
00342 #else
00343     return 0 != ::chdir( path.c_str() );
00344 #endif // _WIN32
00345 }
00346 
00347 
00348 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00349 AI_FORCE_INLINE
00350 bool IOSystem::DeleteFile( const std::string &file ) {
00351     if ( file.empty() ) {
00352         return false;
00353     }
00354     const int retCode( ::remove( file.c_str() ) );
00355     return ( 0 == retCode );
00356 }
00357 }

00359 #endif //AI_IOSYSTEM_H_INC
